snippet: Sun Young Yoo won the Kraft Nabisco Championship with an 18-foot birdie putt on the first playoff hole after I. K. Kim missed a 1-foot putt on the final hole of regulation.
abstract: Golf Roundup; Sun Young Yoo wins sudden-death playoff against I K Kim to win Kraft Nabisco Championship; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sun Young Yoo won the Kraft Nabisco Championship with an 18-foot birdie putt on the first playoff hole after I. K. Kim missed a 1-foot putt on the final hole of regulation.

headline.seo: Yoo Wins Kraft Nabisco Playoff After Rival’s Stunning Miss at 18
headline.main: L.P.G.A.’s First Major Ends in Playoff After Stunning Miss on Final Hole
headline.print_headline: L.P.G.A.’s First Major Ends in Playoff After Stunning Miss on Final Hole
